content: Defeat this third frog menace, and you'll gain another Tadpole and other materials to upgrade your Spirits and gear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
Defeat this third frog menace, and you'll gain another Tadpole and other materials to upgrade your Spirits and gear.
